channel.title: History of Licensed RPGs: Part VIII (2001-02): Age of Ravens
channel.description: I return once again to my History of Licensed RPGs-- this time covering '01 and '02. You'll find of ton of titles in these two years: some good, some d20. It runs the gamut from *Corum* to *Zorro* to *Rune* to *Star Trek*. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/history-of-licensed-rpgs-part-viii-2001-2002

item.title: History of Licensed RPGs: Part VIII (2001-02): Age of Ravens

THE GAUNTLET

History of Licensed RPGs (Part VIII 2001-2002)

ADAPTING TO THE MARKET The time of d20 adaptations is upon us in these lists. Six of the games on this list used the d20 SRD in one form or another. On the one hand, they could write their games as...
